visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average rainfall for a year, with the series name 'Rainfall'. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors and other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes custom background colors and margins for better visual appeal. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis is titled 'Rainfall (mm)' with grid lines styled in a specific color and width. The data series is named 'Rainfall' and contains the monthly average rainfall data. The chart also includes a legend with custom styling for better readability. Overall, the configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
